level.heading: INCLUSIONARY ZONING (ยง 11-3308) All residential development is subject to Inclusionary Zoning and shall beonstructed according to the provisions set forth in Chapter 26 except for ยง604. The FAR, lot occupancy, and height maximums of ยง 3306.2 shall serve as theaximum permitted density for buildings and structures within each subdistrictncluding for the provision of inclusionary units.
